name: Residence Hilda

reviews.title: 3 nights in Florence
reviews.text: On this, my 2th visit to Florence, I stayed at Residence Hilda for 3 nights. It was perfect and I will definitely stay there again. It was affordably priced, and I had a nicely furnished, large and spotlessly clean apartment. The staff was very helpful and the groceries I requested were in my apartment when I arrived. The location was great for the city center tourist spots, and near bus lines that easily got me out to other parts of the city.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Disclaimer: my fiance and I got engaged in our apartment at Residence Hilda, so it will of course hold special memories for us for a long time to come.
reviews.title: Perfect Florence apartment!

reviews.text: That said, this was the perfect place for us to stay in Florence! The staff are extremely warm and accommodating. Well before we arrived, Valentina helped us book one of the most amazing food tour experiences I've ever had, and she and other staff helped with excellent dinner recommendations (we ate our way through the city, which is the best way to do it, in my opinion).
reviews.title: The Perfect Place to Stay

reviews.text: The building is charming, in excellent condition, and our apartment was spacious and gorgeous -- I would have stayed for a month if I could have. I believe there are only 12 apartments, which makes it feel like your home, rather than a hotel. Being in an apartment with a kitchen allowed us to buy fresh food from the central market and cook, which we did a few times.
reviews.title: Sanctuary within the city's heart

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is also ideal -- two blocks from the Duomo and central to everything in Florence.
reviews.title: Good location, Value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights ,everything is excellent
reviews.title: highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: fantastic room very clean and modern,wonderful kitchen,comfortable bedroom
reviews.title: Stay here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, convenient location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I love to stay here and recommend to everyone
reviews.title: Great location, great stay

reviews.text: We hope come back again in a near future
reviews.title: Delightful Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical. I didn't understand the difference between this and a hotel. So here it is. Your room has a bedroom and very nice bathroom as well as a mini- kitchen and table. (mini frig, small 2 burner stove, microwave and basic dishes). There is daily cleaning service with towel / sheet change every other day (daily if pay more). The staff is excellent very helpful, great food recs, helped us get train tickets etc. We had a late train and they let us have a late checkout until 5pm- very helpful. The only downside is that the staff is not there 24/7. There is an emergency number if need but after 7 or 8 pm or on Sundays (except for check in and out) the staff is gone so they are not there to call taxis or ask questions.
reviews.title: Very helpful staff. Nice location near all walking sights.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located right down the street from the Duomo which is nice because no matter where you are in the city you can always find your way back home. The hotel is super clean and the rooms are huge, much larger than what I would expect in a hotel in Europe. The thing that sets this hotel apart from the rest is the service, literally the best I have ever seen the gentlemen at the front desk was super attentive, extremely knowledgable and really made our trip. I would highly recommend this hotel, we will be staying here again when we return to Florence.
reviews.title: Awesome hotel even better service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent location right by the Duomo and about 15 mins walk from the train station. The accommodation is more of an appartment than a hotel and is very modern inside, which is what we wanted. There is a good sized bedroom, excellent bathroom, sitting/ dining area and kitchenette. The staff were very helpful and all round I could not fault this accommodation. The reception closes during the day between 1pm and 3pm so it is worth checking if someone will be there if you need to arrive at this time, or to leave bags. The only down side was some noise from the street during the night but we would definately stay here again next time we are in Florence and would highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Excellent location, great accommodation.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 4 nights at the Hilda, this is our third stay in Florence and Residence Hilda is by far the best place we have stayed, and we can be very critical.
reviews.title: Best of everything
Perfect service but appartments need some further improvements
reviews.text: I like the concept of this residence; discrete, with warm welcome, a few steps from Duomo and Academia.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The strongest point of this place is service, from the very first contact the e-mails are being answered within 2 hours, up-dates about events sent few weeks before arrival and proposals to arrange breakfast, tickets, taxi and shopping delivery put forward.
reviews.title: Brilliant!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I appreciated to have necessary space ( 55 m2) to spend Christmas and to be able to cook. The appartment was freshly repainted in the spring, the floors were in good shape, the kitchen had all necessary equipment to eat, drink, cook, the satelite Tv was providing many channels, the bedroom was nice with the adequate wardrobe space. The bathroom had a shower, 2 towels per person (changed everything 2nd day, same as linen - everyday changes at extra charge) towel heated rack.
reviews.title: the best apartment in firenze

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I paid special rate of EUR 190 for a superior suite, which seems to me still too high taking into consideration following facts:
reviews.title: Heavenly Hilda

reviews.text: - the heating that was installed in our apartment (no 20) was extremely archaic, in fact it was a noisy hot air blower that was switching on when judged that temperature dropped below one set and switching off when the temperature reached set level. This system was installed in both living and bedroom easily waking up those with light sleep
reviews.title: The best place ever :)

description: The comforts of a hotel in a designer apartment, located 3 blocks away from the main cathedral!At the elegant Residence Hilda you get more privacy than at a 5 star hotel, light and streamlined interiors, designer details conspicuous only by their restraint. All the Suites have teak parquet floors, calm off-white walls, soft beige furnishings and some occasional colour accent.
